春花秋月何时了？:
The phrase '春花秋月何时了？' (chūn huā qiū yuè hé shí liǎo?) means 'When will the spring flowers and autumn moon come to an end?'

Here's a breakdown of the words and individual characters:
- 春花 (chūn huā): spring flowers
- 春 (chūn): spring
- 花 (huā): flower
- 秋月 (qiū yuè): autumn moon
- 秋 (qiū): autumn
- 月 (yuè): moon
- 何时 (hé shí): when
- 何 (hé): what/when
- 时 (shí): time
- 了 (liǎo): a modal particle indicating a change or completion of a state
